title: Temps mort
overview: A geological event begins a series of wild weather changes. As the snow fall and low temperatures reach historic proportions JoÃ«l, a Montreal mailman and his friend head out of town. Things go from bad to worse as basic services break down and isolated survivors try to cope when it appears that this new frozen dystopia is the new normal. Sometimes referred to as the Quebecois "Walking Dead", the series features creative writing, convincing acting and great cinematography.
